question: What is the Goal for Faction Feuds?

answers.text: Score as many points as possible, as efficiently as possible, while working together as a team
If outmatched, use props to help ensure a victory
Work hard and fast to score as many points as you personally can
Beat your opponent at all costs

question: When helping your teammates, always heal ______

answers.text: From the top first, then work your way down
From the bottom first, then work your way up
anyone you can quickly see on your screen then get back into the next feud ASAP
only when you need heals youself

question: If The upcomming Feud requirements are: 2 Legends, 2 Raw Power Houses, 1 Raw Striker. Select the superstar below that CANNOT be posted for faction heal requests during the feud.
